title: Train service disruption from Jurong to Joo Koon

title_translations.zh-Hans: 裕廊至裕廊镇火车服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kereta dari Jurong ke Joo Koon
title_translations.ta: ஜூரோங் முதல் ஜூ கூன் வரை ரயில் சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: UPDATE:Train service from Jurong towards Joo Koon is running well again.
UPDATE:Staff are working to rectify fault. Updates to come.
Train service from Jurong towards Joo Koon moving slower due to track fault.Please allow extra time for travel.
